comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: Wow -- just like the Maginot line. All the enemy had to do was go around it.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Battle now pinpointed: Cropped from original Agence Meurisse photo shown at Bibliotheque Nationale de France's Gallica site, with following caption: "En Belgique : combats de Haelen et de Diest : barrage sur la route de Liège " [In Belgium: Battle of Haelen and Diest: Barricade on the road to Liège] Pub. Date 1914

comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: Interesting... those are obviously the same shot, yet Bain's has a copyright scrawl on it.  I guess attribution was a problem a hundred years ago, too.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: maybe they purchased U.S. rights or something?
